ygData.msgSnippet: ... The Hero is the Hill Giant of the area. Qeynos guards also fall quickly against hill giants, or the griffons (for those on duty in the Karanas). Don t
ygData.messageBody:
> Steamfont guards -- good reaction time, but they're relatively weaker than
> some of the MoBs you might encounter in the area. If you hear "Hero" you
> should basically zone out. :) Weak little stinky gnomes...OOPS! Did I just
> say that out loud? heh

The Hero is the Hill Giant of the area. Qeynos guards also fall quickly
against hill giants, or the griffons (for those on duty in the Karanas).
Don't expect the Commonland guards to survive attack by griffons either.
---------------------------------


The "Hero" in Steamfont is the Minotaur Hero, who spawns near the caves and rampages through the zone, killing all in his path. I have seen him rage all the way to the entrance to Ak'Anon, killing guards all the way. By the time he got to Ak'Anon, he had been weakened enough for the guards to finish him off.
